meanings.definition: Relating to or affected by hyperemia.
meanings.sent1: The doctor observed the hyperemic skin around the wound.
meanings.sent2: The hyperemic cheeks indicated a fever.
meanings.sent3: The hyperemic teddy bear looked like it had a sunburn.
meanings.sent4: Her anger made her face hyperemic, like a boiling kettle.
meanings.sent5: The hyperemic color of the flower made it stand out in the garden.

meanings.definition: Characterized by an excess of blood in a part of the body.
meanings.sent1: The hyperemic toe throbbed painfully in his shoe.
meanings.sent2: The hyperemic rash was warm to the touch.
meanings.sent3: The hyperemic balloon looked like it might burst at any moment.
meanings.sent4: His hyperemic face after running resembled a ripe tomato.
meanings.sent5: The hyperemic area on the map showed where the traffic was congested.

meanings.sent1: The hyperemic tissue was more sensitive to touch.
meanings.sent2: The hyperemic spot on the scan indicated inflammation.
meanings.sent3: The hyperemic river flowed rapidly after the heavy rain.
meanings.sent4: Her hyperemic fingertips tingled with warmth.
meanings.sent5: The hyperemic glow of the sunset painted the sky in shades of red.
